import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { postProfile } from "../../redux/actions/ProfileWorker"; const InputFormWorker = () => { const { data, loading, error } = useSelector((state) => state.post); const [formEditProfile, setformEditProfile] = useState({ namalengkap: "", jobdesk: "", domisili: "", instagram: "", github: "", gitlab: "", deskripsiSingkat: "", }); return ( <> {/* Data Diri */}
